entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
